Hellplague/ Malice:

"It's a solution to something Unicron saw as a potential problem.  
I'll tell you later," the Sweep commander said as the scan was 
completed.
The chamber opened and Malice stepped out.  He cleared the cobwebs 
from his head, then stepped over to Blacknightmare.
"Do you need me for anything else?" the Hunter Killer asked as he 
secretly reached out and took Blacknightmare's hand.
"No, you two can round up the others and relay our battle plans.  I 
will wrap this up."
Hellplague shifted her weight, she needed to monitor the data on the 
clone as it developed.  It may not be a perfect clone of him, it may 
prove a hazard if not monitored.
